meanings.definition: A painting or photograph depicting a view of the sea.
meanings.sent1: The artist's seapiece captured the beauty of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I hung a seapiece in my living room to remind me of the beach.
meanings.sent3: The seapiece on the wall seemed to bring a sense of calm to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her seapiece was like a window to the vastness of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The seapiece's colors made it feel like you were standing on the shore.

meanings.definition: A literary or musical work inspired by the sea.
meanings.sent1: The author's seapiece was a novel filled with tales of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Listening to the symphony, I could feel the waves in the seapiece.
meanings.sent3: The seapiece of poetry painted a vivid picture of life at sea.
meanings.sent4: His song was a seapiece that carried listeners to distant shores.
meanings.sent5: The seapiece of literature was a journey through maritime adventures.
